ag_1.name: Agriculture Upgrade I
ag_1.description:
Minor Agriculture Upgrade improves efficiency of farms,
		increasing agricultural output by 10%

ag_2.name: Agriculture Upgrade II
ag_2.description:
Agriculture Upgrade II allows more advanced farming techniques,
		improving ability of farms to seed and harvest large regions. Improves
		agricultural output by 15%

ag_3.name: Agriculture Upgrade III
ag_3.description:
Agriculture Upgrade III develops new method for fertilization,
		improving time for crop harvest and allowing increased efficiency at an industrial
		scale. Increases agricultural output by 20%
